thread.title: Stephen Colbert Tears Donald Trump To Shreds Over Russian Mess
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert Tears Donald Trump To Shreds Over Russian Mess

author: Ron Dicker
title: Stephen Colbert Tears Donald Trump To Shreds Over Russian Mess
text:
Stephen Colbert Tears Donald Trump To Shreds Over Russian Mess So much material, so little airtime. 02/16/2017 08:40 am ET Ron Dicker General Assignment Reporter, The Huffington Post 
On Wednesday, Stephen Colbert packed his monologue with zingers aimed at the Trump administration’s questionable relationship with Russia. 
Referring to reports that Donald Trump ’s aides were “ in constant touch with senior Russian officials during the campaign,” the “Late Show” host said: “Constant Touch, by the way, is also Trump’s Secret Service code name.” 
Yep, he went there. 
Watch the bit at the two-minute mark in the video above. Also on HuffPost
